Key: (My name is Shido Itsuka.)

(I'm a normal student attending
Raizen High School.)

(...Well, there was a period of time when that was
true.)
(But not anymore...)

(It seems as though I've awoken the
true me from within.)

(I may look like a normal sophomore in high
school, but it's not true. My true nature is...)
(That's right―a master!)
And Tohka, my loyal servant.
Y-Yes... Master...

Hehe. You sure look pathetic, Tohka. But it looks
really good on you.

D-Don't look at me so much... I-I'm getting
embarrassed.

Oh... You must have forgotten how to speak to me,
Tohka. You do know your place, don't you?
...Y-Yes... My apologies, Master.

Good girl. So do you know what I'm going
to do to you?
Wh-What are you going to do...?

Hehehe. I wonder what it could be...?
Try to guess.
...*Grunt*.

What's the matter? Tell me. Tohka, what is going
to happen to you? All dressed up and bound like
that... What is your master going to do to you?
...I-I can't say. It's... too embarrassing.

My, my. Tohka, do you think that I'm going to do
something embarrassing to you? You're a bad girl.
*Grunt*... Mm... Kaaah.
What's the matter, Tohka?
...That's not fair, Shido.
Hmm? What are you supposed to call me?
M-Master...

That's right, Tohka. All right, then let me give
you a treat and do something embarrassing,
just as you wanted.
Oh, no... I can't...
Huh? Tohka, you don't want to?

Then let's stop and go home today, Tohka.
Hmm, maybe I'll call Origami or someone else to
play with.
Y-You can't do that, Shido.

What? Then what do you want me to do?
Say it, Tohka.

...*Grunt*. P-Please... Do whatever you want...
with me... Master...

Good answer, Tohka. Then let me do as you please.
I can do whatever I want to you, right?

*Grunt*... Y-Yes. I... I will do... whatever
Master says...
Hehehe. Then let's first start off with...
Start off with...

(Hm... that's troubling. Uh, what am I supposed to
do at a time like this?)
Give her a quiz.
Take her to tickle hell.
Make her smell some food.
All right, Tohka. I have a quiz for you.
Y-Yes, Master.
What's a kind of bread that you shouldn't eat?

*Grunt*... A-A bread that you can't eat? How
troubling... What is it?
So, what's a bread that you can't eat, Tohka?

*Grunt*... Hmmmm... I-I don't know. I don't know
at all, Shido.
Do you give up?

I give up... I don't know what kind of bread there
is that you can't eat. That's terrible. It's so
unnatural.

"I see. Then you've failed. By the way, the answer
is a "purebred". I must punish... those who got it
wrong."
What?! ...What are you doing?
Hmm. Let's see... Let's spray you with water.
Wh-What... But that'll be cold!
Well, it is a punishment. Here we go.
Hyaah...

Hehehe. Second question. Who could drive all their
customers away but still make money?

...Hmmmm. I-I don't know. Who could do something
like that...?

Failed again. The answer is a taxi driver. Another
punishment for Tohka.
Hyah...
So, third question...
I... I don't know...
Fourth question...
...I don't know at all.
Fifth question...
I-I... give up.
...*Pant, pant*.
How's that, Tohka?
*Grunt*... I give up.
That's 10 questions in a row you got wrong, Tohka.
Hah... hyah...
You're pretty wet now.
*Grunt*... Don't come here.
Oh, look at you. You're so wet, Tohka.
Ahhh?! You can't come near me, Shido!

Amazing. You're completely drenched, all the way
to a place like here...
N-Not there...
Ahh, look at how wet you are.

D-Don't look... at my back... too much. M-My
bra... will be visible...

Do you have time to worry about that, Tohka?
You're wet down below too, aren't you?
D-Down below...?!

Your socks, Tohka. When your socks are wet, it
feels very uncomfortable, doesn't it...?
*Grunt*... That's true, it does feel awful.
Fine. Then let's end the quiz here.
Is... it over?
Yeah. The quiz, that is.
Y-You're... still going to do something?

Ah. This is only the beginning. Next, I'm going to
use this German-brand cloth that sucks water up
like crazy to wipe the water off of you.
Wh-What?! What is this interesting cloth?!

Look at this. See how much it's sucking the water
up. I've always wanted to see how much I can
suck out.
That's not fair, Shido! I want to do it, too!
You can't. Tohka, you can only watch.
*Grunt*... Curse you, Shido... Huh?!
Hahahaha!

(And the sketchy relationship between master and
servant continued all night...)

All right, I'm going to tickle you like crazy. I'm
going to take this feather toy and tickle you
everywhere.
Hi... I-If you do such a thing... it'll tickle!
Of course it will. Welcome to tickle hell.
Haah... St-Stop, Shido!

"Don't you mean, "Please stop, Master"? Here.
Tickle, tickle."
Fwaaaaa... Aha...kuyha.
Here. Tickle, tickle.

Hahhaha...aha. P-Please stop... Ma—HAH!—ster...
Ahahaha...
Oh, but I won't. Tickle, tickle, tickle, tickle.
Hahahaha... Mm...mmmm...mu. N-Nooo.
Here, this way... Tickle, tickle, tickle, tickle.
A-Ahhhh. Not there... Aha...ahh.
Tickle, tickle, tickle, tickle...
Ah...ah... ah...kufu... Hauuuun.
Tickle, tickle, tickle, tickle...
...Hah...aunnn...
Tickle, tickle, tickle, tickle...
Ahh, no... No... Noooo.
Here, here, here, here.
Haaaaa...aha... Ahahaha...!
There, there, there, there.
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA.
Here, here, here.
UHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.
There, there, there.
AHAHAHAHAHAHA!

Hah... Hah... No, Shido... I can't...
No more, or—!
*Pant, pant*... Ah, I'm getting tired too.

I just can't bear to laugh anymore. I thought I
was going to die.
Hm. Good children shouldn't try this at home.
Shido, that was a very good lesson.
Yeah. Let's keep it at that.
(And this is how I enjoyed my time as a master.)
Hmm. I'll have you smell some food.
What?! What are you going to do, Shido?!

Here you go, Tohka. Here's a Hamburg steak with
demi-glace, Tohka.
*Grunt*. That smells so good.
Right?
Shido! I'm getting hungry!
That's right. Then I'll let you smell it, Tohka.
Just the smell?! That's torture!
Hmm? Oh what? You want to eat this, Tohka?
I-I want to eat... Of course I do!
Then you know what you need to say, right Tohka?
Master! Master, give me the Hamburg steak!
Hmm... Here you go. Open up.
Ahhh.
I'll come closer.
Ahhh.

Now, I'm going to make it look like you can eat
it, but... Yoink.
HEY?! What are you doing, Shido?!

No good, Tohka. If you ask that way,
you won't get it.
I-It's not nice to be mean, Shido.

No, but... I'm a master. Tohka, you know who has
more power here, right?
P-Please...!
Hm? What is it?

Please Shid—I mean Master. The steak... please
give me the steak!

Hmm... Right. Then, one more time. Here you go.
Ahh.
A-Ahhh.

Then I'm going to put the steak near your mouth.
Is that good? But you can't eat it until the
master says you can...
W-Wha... das so messed up...
If you talk with your mouth open, you'll drool.

Th-This isn't the time to worry about that.
Hurry... Hurry and let me eat!
Hmm. What should I do?
*Pant, pant*. H-Hurry!
Then I guess I'll eat it... *nom*.

Ah?! You ate it yourself?! What... What
torture...!
Mmm. It's so juicy. It's just melting in my mouth.

Curse you, Master! It's not fair,
you get everything!
I told you that I'd let you smell it, Tohka. Here.
MMM! *Grunt*... That looks so good!
Right?
*Grunt* Don't just leave it in front of my nose.
Well then, I think I will for a bit.
Stop! Stop it! I'll go mad...!
*Pant, pant*... *pant, pant*...
Your drool. It's starting to drip.

*Grunt* This is painful... Please, I'll do
anything. I'll do anything, just please
give me a taste of that steak...
No.

Gosh... This isn't good... My consciousness is
fading...
That's an exaggeration...
...*blow, blow*... *nom*...
What?!
She's eating a steak in her imagination?!
Mmm... *nom*.

An invisible steak... That sure is commitment...
What do you say, Tohka... Is it good?
...Hah.
...Ah. Yes... It's delicious...
I-I see... That's great...

(All right, I guess I'll let her eat in a little
while.)
(And so our night continued...)
